solution_line_template: If Coco used his oven {usage_hours} hours last month and its energy consumption is {consumption_per_hour} kW per hour, then we consumed a total of {usage_hours}*{consumption_per_hour}= <<{usage_hours}*{consumption_per_hour}={total_consumption}>>{total_consumption} kW on his oven last month
If the price of electricity is ${price_per_kw} per kW, then {total_consumption} kW would cost = ${price_per_kw}*{total_consumption} = $<<{price_per_kw}*{total_consumption}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
